name: Equal Breathing
description: Involves inhaling and exhaling for the same duration, promoting balance and calmness.

name: Alternate Nostril Breathing
description: Balances the mind and body by alternating the breath between the two nostrils.

name: Skull Shining Breath
description: A powerful, rapid breathing technique involving forceful exhalations and passive inhalations.

name: Bee Breath
description: Involves producing a humming sound while exhaling, calming the mind and reducing anxiety.

name: Victorious Breath
description: A slow, deep breathing technique with a slight constriction in the throat, enhancing concentration and controlling the flow of breath.

name: Bellows Breath
description: Forceful inhalations and exhalations through the nose, increasing oxygen supply and energizing the mind.

name: Cooling Breath
description: Involves inhaling through a rolled tongue and exhaling through the nose, cooling the body and soothing the nervous system.

name: Right Nostril Breathing
description: Involves inhaling through the right nostril and exhaling through the left, stimulating the body and increasing energy.

name: Left Nostril Breathing
description: Involves inhaling through the left nostril and exhaling through the right, calming the mind and inducing relaxation.
